answer:
Have you tried checking the Influenza (Flu) Locator to find a clinic? There are several locations in Salmon Arm including some drop in clinics and walk ins allowed in one location. If you click on the clinic location it will take you to their schedule.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Have you tried checking the Influenza (Flu) Locator to find a clinic?
There are several locations in Salmon Arm including some drop in clinics and walk ins allowed in one location.

## If you click on the clinic location it will take you to their schedule.

Immunization Nurse
question: Why is it such a hassle this year to get a shot? Makes no sense for people to be phoning all over town to make an appointment. Promote getting vaccinated then make everyone jump around in Salmon Arm.
